name: Ultra Pong (DragorGames)
description:
My FIRST godot project - every form of feedback is welcome!

DESCRIPTION

Welcome to ULTRA PONG - an adaption of the ATARI original from 1972.

Challenge yourself against a HUMAN player or the AI in SINGLE GAME mode, or survive as long as possible in SURVIVAL GAME against the ever increasing ai.

You control the left paddle with the keys [W] and [D], the right one with the keys [Up] and [Down]. Or you can directly use the touch input on the display. Just swipe up or down on your side.

Do you like fast rallies and excitement. Then the ACTION mode is right for you. If you prefer a more deliberate and calm approach, then choose the STRATEGY mode.

Looking for the ultimate challenge? Then play with the BUMPER, which literally gives the ball a new direction - no one can be sure if you choose RANDOM mode. The ball gets faster and faster - how responsive are you? If you want a break press [ESC] or [P].

Customize your game: determine the size and speed of the paddles, set the points you need to win.

But the most important thing remains: Hit the ball with the right part of the paddle - so that it becomes unreachable for your opponent. This is how you master ULTRAPONG!
